caseSubject: U/A 184/Enforcement of Fundamental Rights / Human Rights
caseTitle: Engineer Iqbal Zafar Jhagra v. Federation of Pakistan and others
tagline: There was prima facie no justification for imposition of carbon surcharge in place of Petroleum Development Levy because such a tax could be imposed subject to certain conditions, such as provision of petroleum products free of lead or carbon dioxide and consequential pollution free atmosphere to all citizens.
